articles.title: Sheela Foam to acquire rival mattress maker Kurlon for Rs 2,000 crore, says report - The Economic Times
articles.description: Kurlon sells Kurl-on branded mattresses and it has presence across India with more than 10,000 dealers, 72 branches and stock points. Kurlon also has nine manufacturing facilities across Karnataka, Odisha, Madhya Pradesh, Uttaranchal and Gujarat.
